definition: 4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence

sentences.english: The vital signs before extubation were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 記錄拔管前的生命體徵。

sentences.english: The typical sign was audible click and systolic murmur in cardiac apex.
sentences.chinese: 典型體徵爲心尖區聞及喀喇音和收縮期雜音。

sentences.english: There were no symptoms or signs of vertigo on head-turning maneuvers.
sentences.chinese: 在轉頭動作時沒有眩暈的症狀和體徵。

sentences.english: He thought, for acute pyelitis, the beginning was a new affection syndrome and aincubative pathogen syndrome secondly.
sentences.chinese: 急性腎盂炎初呈新感之症狀，繼現伏邪之體徵。

sentences.english: Examination of osteoarthritic joints is remarkable for the absence of inflammatory signs.
sentences.chinese: 引入注重的是檢查骨關節炎性關節時無炎症性體徵。

sentences.english: His doctor said Zhao is conscious and has stable vital signs.
sentences.chinese: 主診醫生稱患者神志清醒，各項生命體徵平穩。

sentences.english: read their physical signs to you and assess how they're doing.
sentences.chinese: 研究他們的體徵，估計應該怎麼爲他們治療。

sentences.english: New research published online in the FASEB Journal shows that high levels of phosphates may add more "pop" to sodas and processed foods than once thought.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲研究者發現高水平的磷酸鹽加速了衰老體徵。

sentences.english: Absent tor reduced vibration sense is the first sign of neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 振動覺缺失或減弱是神經病變的第一體徵。

sentences.english: About a half of the patients had no heart murmurs.
sentences.chinese: 心臟雜音非本病特異體徵，約半數患者無明顯雜音。

sentences.english: Main body is asked for is epigastrium tenderness.
sentences.chinese: 主要體徵是上腹部壓痛。

sentences.english: All the signs were restricted to glossitis .
sentences.chinese: 所有的體徵都沒有超出舌炎的範圍。

sentences.english: The zinc deficient rats had poor appetite and retarded growth.
sentences.chinese: 缺鋅組大鼠食慾減退，生長髮育遲緩，出現缺鋅體徵。

sentences.english: The 15-year old is stabilised, but the seven-year old is already dead.
sentences.chinese: 15歲小孩生命體徵漸趨穩定，但7歲小孩已經死了。

sentences.english: The symptoms and signs were observed before and after treatment.
sentences.chinese: 觀察不同配穴治療前後症狀及體徵的變化。

sentences.english: First signs and symptoms are observed a few months or weeks after infection.
sentences.chinese: 在感染之後數月或數週可觀察到最初的體徵和症狀。

definition: bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4
